data.title: Lorain County Ohio Obituaries
data.text:
Santiago Maldonado, 93, Owned Barber Shop

Santiago Papi Chago Maldonado 93 of Lorain died Thursday, Dec. 10, 2009 in Avon Oaks Caring Community following a lengthy illness.

Full Obituary

Dorothy L. Mundy, 82, Lorain Resident

Dorothy L. Mundy, 82 of Lorain died Tuesday, Dec. 8, 2009 at the Oak Hills Nursing Home in Lorain following a long illness.

Full Obituary

Marie A. DiLuciano, 80, Enjoyed Spending Time with Family

Marie A. (nee Sofia) DiLuciano, 80, passed away on Friday, Dec. 11, 2009, at EMH, Elyria.

Full Obituary

Staff Sergeant Valentino R. Mendoza, 28, Served his Country as a Marine

Staff Sergeant Valentino R. Mendoza, 28 formerly of Lorain went home to be with his Lord, Wednesday, Dec. 9, 2009 in his loving home in Cuyahoga Falls, following a battle with cancer.

Full Obituary

Joseph A. Hlebcar, 96, Served with US Army in WWII

Joseph A. Hlebcar, 96, of Lorain, died Monday Dec. 7, 2009 at Community Regional Medical Center in Lorain after a short illness.

Full Obituary

Ronald P. Hook, 67, Enjoyed Listening to Jazz Music

Ronald P. Santino Hook, age 67, of Amherst, died Monday Dec. 7, 2009 at Community Health Partners Hospital & Surgical Center following a three month illness.

Full Obituary

Mark R. Gawlik, 55, Loved Building Model Cars

Mark R. Gawlik, 55, of Lorain, died Sunday Dec. 6, 2009 at the Hospice of the Western Reserve Hospice House in Cleveland after a short illness.

Full Obituary

William A. Toth, 88, Senior Millwright at U.S. Steel

William A. Toth, age 88 of Lorain, died Saturday Dec. 5, 2009 at Hearthstone at Lorain.

Full Obituary

Rudolph J. Cirell, 85, World War II Veteran of US Navy

Rudolph J. Rudy Cirell, age 85, of Lorain, died Friday Dec. 4th, 2009 at the Specialty Hospital of Lorain following a brief illness.

Full Obituary

Catherine Papajcik, 89, Seamstress

Catherine Papajcik, (nee Turon), age 89, of Mentor, and formerly of Lorain, died Saturday at the Mentor Way Nursing and Rehabilitation Center following an extended illness.

Full Obituary

Sylvia M. Barnicle-Hambly, 73, Enjoyed Interior Decorating

Sylvia M. Barnicle-Hambly,(nee Reed), age 73, of Amherst Township, died Saturday Dec. 5th at the New Life Hospice Center of St. Joseph following an extended illness.

Full Obituary

Connor William Whitaker, Infant Son

Connor William Whitaker of Lorain was stillborn on Dec. 2, 2009 at Community Health Partners Regional Medical Center.

Full Obituary

Patricia A. Kryc, 69, Legal Secretary

Patricia A. Kryc, (nee Striker), age 69, of Lorain, died Friday Dec. 4th at her residence.

Full Obituary

Patricia A. Waters, 49, Enjoyed Crocheting and Playing Cards

Patricia A. Waters, 49 (nee Pasta) of Lorain passed away on Thursday, Dec. 3, 2009 at Speciality Hospital of Lorain in Amherst following a long illness.

Full Obituary
